mapper.insert: insert into customers (cust_id, cust_name, address, phone) values (${custId},#{custName},#{address},#{phone})
mapper.select: select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers where cust_id like ${custId}
mapper.update: update orders set cust_id=${custId}, cust_name=#{custName}, address, phone where order_id like ${orderId}
mapper.delete: delete from orders where order_id like ${orderId}
mapper.select: select cust_id customerId, cust_name customerName, address, phone from customers where cust_name like '%'|| #{value} ||'%'
select cust_id customerId, cust_name customerName, address, phone from customers where address like '%'|| #{value} ||'%'
